cleaned_text: Sign up and we'll send you rebates, promotions and maybe even some free stuff. UpNature HIGH QUALITY RENEW ESSENTIAL OIL BLEND: Blend of tea tree, lavender, cedarwood, lemon essential oils. 100% pure, gentle, and effective non-GMO natural essential oil. No toxins, additives. Unfiltered and undiluted. Pure therapeutic grade. Steam distilled. Made in the USA. NATURAL ESSENTIAL OIL - With a comforting and fresh aroma, create a soothing, calm atmosphere by adding a few drops of this essential oil to your diffuser. This mood-boosting blend will help you relax and improve skin health. BOOSTS ENERGY AND SKIN HEALTH - Each ingredient in this oil blend contains unique properties that help improve skin/nail health, boost mood, improve focus, relieve muscle soreness, and reduce stress. The invigorating aroma will leave you feeling renewed. SAFETY PRECAUTION - For external use only. We recommend that you patch test the oils for topical use. Apply to clean skin on the inside of your elbow or wrist. Cover with a bandage and leave for 24 hours. If a rash or redness appears, discontinue use. WE ARE UPNATURE - UpNature products are 100% pure and natural with no dilution or added fragrances. We offer a full 100% money-back guarantee. If you are not satisfied with UpNature essential oils, we will refund your entire purchase.
